Posted By: HairlessThoctar (4/16/2010 10:40:08 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I love this card. I can't wait to get one to put in my vampire deck. It's the only late game mono black mana booster that I know of.  
  
@demonixx: I play casually with my friends. This is a bomb for consume spirit or any of the new Eldrazi. Those are what I was considering for mana acceleration. Also, two dark rituals on turn two to bring this out and then every turn after that you could probably get anything out that you wanted to.
posts.html:
I love this card. I can't wait to get one to put in my vampire deck. It's the only late game mono black mana booster that I know of.

@demonixx: I play casually with my friends. This is a bomb for consume spirit or any of the new Eldrazi. Those are what I was considering for mana acceleration. Posted By: HippyRei (4/16/2010 4:35:47 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
A great card for decks using [Dark Ritual](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dark Ritual)s. Possible 1st turn creature if you're palying casual with some [Lotus Petal](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lotus Petal) or [Archaeological Dig](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Archaeological Dig) or she could be a 4/4 on turn four.  
  
I pulled one from a pack but i have no plans of getting another piece. Very useful on Eldrazi creatures though.
posts.html:
A great card for decks using Dark Rituals. Possible 1st turn creature if you're palying casual with some Lotus Petal or Archaeological Dig or she could be a 4/4 on turn four.

I pulled one from a pack but i have no plans of getting another piece. Very useful on Eldrazi creatures though.
